name: Ace Attorney Investigations 2
description:
Ace Attorney Investigations 2 is an adventure game developed by Capcom. It came out on 03-02-2011. It was published by Capcom. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
Ace Attorney Investigations 2 is available on iOS, Android and Nintendo DS.
Motohide Eshiro produced the game. Takeshi Yamazaki directed the game. It was scored by Noriyuki Iwadare.
